name: Diamond Fever
overview: Diamond Fever is a variation/game inspired by the Breakout genre in which instead of a paddle, you just control the ball itself and your goal is to get rid of the all the blocks and collect diamonds that are in the center of the field of blocks. Unlike standard breakout games though, this as well also adds to the difficulty because you can also lose your ball if you hit the TOP of the screen. It was developed by Ronald Meyer and published by CP Verlag in Magic Disk 64 1989/01.
